DOC.brief_summary: This study compare ability single-dose novel ibuprofen formulation relieve pain compare placebo standard ibuprofen treatment episodic tension-type headache .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating A Novel Ibuprofen Formulation In Episodic Tension-Type Headache
DOC.criteria: Males female least 18 year 65 year age A diagnosis episodic tensiontype headache , define International Headache Society A history episodic tensiontype headache follow characteristic : 4 headache episode per month last 6 month moderately severe intensity ; headache generally last 3 hour leave untreated ; adequate headache relief generally obtain overthecounter ( OTC ) dose OTC analgesic Pregnancy breastfeed Alcohol substance abuse Any serious medical psychiatric disorder History stomach ulcer , stomach bleed , bleed disorder
